system.description: Contains tools for a medic to help others in the field. Higher technology medkits will include diagnostic devices and scanners, surgical tools and a panoply of drugs and antibiotics. Though not necessarily giving out a bonus to basic treatment, these can help with more exotic problems or when treating augmented individuals. For example, a TL 8 medkit can test blood pressure and temperature, among other things; a TL 14 kit has a medical densitometer to create a three-dimensional view of the patientâ€™s body and can scan brain activity on the quantum level. Double price for each TL increment above 8.
system.shortdescr: Tools for a medic to help others in the field.
